text: The flag of Irapuato () It is colored marine blue and red and the coat of arms in the center. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the width of the stripes. The ratio of the flag is 4:7. ==Related pages== * Flags of municipalities of Mexico * Irapuato * Flag of Guanajuato ==References== Irapuato Category:Flags with coats of arms
title: Flag of Irapuato
